DOC.brief_summary: To improve quality of life of elderly cancer survivors 1. Using physical activity and environmental sensing technology 2. Monitoring physiological indicators of cancer recurrence - Analyzing the patient's circadian rhythm, frailty and his/her vital sign. - Vital sign includes blood pressure, weight and hrv. 3. Collecting the patient information in real time - Giving alarm information to the patient, if any special cases our system found. - Giving circadian rhythm report to the patient. - Giving healthy report to the patient, collected from his/her vital sign.
DOC.brief_title: Health Status Evaluation for Cancer Survivors by Non-intrusive Sensing System
DOC.criteria: The clinical pathology and diagnostic imaging to determine the cancer who completed acute treatment, and patients with more than a month recuperating. Over 65 years old.
